mapper.select:
select wiisb.init_stock_barcode_id,wiisb.init_stock_id,wiisb.init_stock_det_id,wiisb.in_plant_barcode,wiisb.sales_barcode,wiisb.client_barcode1,wiisb.client_barcode2,wiisb.client_barcode3,bm.material_code,bm.material_desc FROM wms_inner_init_stock_barcode wiisb left join wms_inner_init_stock_det wiisd on wiisb.init_stock_det_id = wiisd.init_stock_det_id left join base_material bm on bm.material_id = wiisd.material_id
and wiisb.init_stock_det_id=#{initStockDetId}
and wiisb.init_stock_id=#{initStockId}
and bm.material_code like CONCAT('%',#{materialCode},'%')
and wiisb.in_plant_barcode like CONCAT('%',#{inPlantBarcode},'%')
and wiisb.sales_barcode like CONCAT('%',#{salesBarcode},'%')
and (wiisb.client_barcode1 like CONCAT('%',#{clientBarcode},'%') or wiisb.client_barcode2 like CONCAT('%',#{clientBarcode},'%') or wiisb.client_barcode3 like CONCAT('%',#{clientBarcode},'%'))
order by wiisb.init_stock_barcode_id desc
